item_category: Streamline your life with the speed of TCL 10 5G. Harnesses the power of the newest generation of wireless connectivity to give you faster browsing, seamless productivity, and bufferless streaming. Discover the powerful capability of 5G with steadier, faster network and Wi-Fi connection. Enjoy fluid performance with 5G-enhanced AI. Stream blazing fast on a 6.53-inch FHD+ display with enhanced colour, clarity, contrast and HDR viewing powered by NXTVISION. Capture shake-free 4K video and high-res images with the versatile 64MP AI quad-camera.
review_text: Great, fast, and ive had no issues apart from the battery is not as long lasting as I thought it would be but then again I'm on it alot lol
